Hi,

As you are using struts frame work you can use
http://strutstestcase.sourceforge.net/

There is a gud tutorial available at

http://javaboutique.internet.com/tutorials/StrutsTestCase/index-11.html

Regards,
Gunjeet

 --- Preeti  <preeti@...> wrote: 
---------------------------------
Hello, 

I have never used JUnit before. I want to start
creating test suite. 
But I donot know where to get started. 
The application to be tested is created using JSP's,
Servelets, 
Struts and Java files. It is based on MVC model. The
application is 
deployed on Tomcat and is IE based. 

First this I want to know is Can I use JUnit to test
this 
application. 

What kind of applications can be tested through JUnit
? 

Thanks, 
Preeti
